name: LD46 - Prototype Towers
description:
Long ago, there was a prophecy that says there will be an alien invasion sometime in the future. In order to prepare for it, people have started developing defensive towers. But the aliens learned about it and so they have set to attack the facility.

Unfortunately, the towers are still in the prototype stage! They overheat easily and must be fixed and restarted every time it happens.

Defend your base while keeping your towers functioning.

Controls: Mouse and Arrow Keys!
